page.title: 07NON-FARMING RESIDENCES
page.content: The{houses}we visited and the people that lived there had nothing to do with the many nearby farms.The people we found spent little time in their own homes as they had{jobs in nearby {towns.}The first house we came to belonged to a Mr Chaffy,who worked as a teacher in Oswestry and had lived in this area for 4 years,having previously lived in Birmingham.His house was a{renovated farm cottage that was falling apart and he also has a small holding of 3 fields that are roughly 4 acres in size.Also present in this small community are some doctors from Overton. In another house we visited there lived a{retired Major}from the army and he has lived here for 12 years.He enjoys gardening and keeps bees, he keeps most of the honey for himself but he does sell some.
